extensionAttribute.displayName: Forced Software Update Countdown Start Date
extensionAttribute.description: Date after which a defined countdown in days can trigger forced Software Updates.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac:
#/usr/bin/env zsh
### Enter your organization's preference domain below
companyDomain=ltd.randm
echo "<result>$(defaults read /Library/Preferences/$companyDomain.SoftwareUpdatePreferences.plist StartDate)</result>"
